trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cottage Grove
There were no other sightings in Cottage Grove on or around August 2nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in Cottage Grove Or charging my phone outside the Goodwill waiting for my Girlfriend to pick me up. I saw an object flying slow ahead. I noticed that it was silent and the colors of the lights were odd. At first I thought it was a plane but it made a strange 90 degree turn and started flashing brilliant colors. its started to fly south away from me and I unplugged my phone and took footage of the object. It flew up, down, left, right, and even diagonal. I got it all on film. I was very happy to get the footage about 15 minutes of the objects flight patterns and colors. after about 17 minutes from when I spotted it the lights faded out. feel free to contact me I got some great footage you should see. I do not want to just post the film you have to contact me if you want to see it. thanks
Object Shape: Cone, Cylinder, Diamond, Oval, Sphere, Triangle, Other, Unknown
Summary: maney different colors...I HAVE FOOTAGE!! Flying up, down, diagonal, as if it were servayin the area.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
